## Public Member Functions

### compare() {#a3f829e545bc1ac99b664a81f064eadc3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::mca::DefaultSchedulerStrategy::compare (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instref">InstRef</a> &amp; Lhs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instref">InstRef</a> &amp; Rhs) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Returns true if Lhs should take priority over Rhs.

This method is used by class <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/scheduler">Scheduler</a> to select the &quot;best&quot; ready instruction to issue to the underlying pipelines.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/hardwareunits/scheduler-h/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/hardwareunits/scheduler-h">Scheduler.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### computeRank() {#af00c5e6825861eb05e8bd560d71f9241}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int llvm::mca::DefaultSchedulerStrategy::computeRank (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instref">InstRef</a> &amp; Lhs) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
This method ranks instructions based on their age, and the number of known users.

The lower the rank value, the better.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/hardwareunits/scheduler-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/hardwareunits/scheduler-h">Scheduler.h</a>.
